entries.title_d: The Dantooine station had made an agreement to buy a shipment of cargo out of the Tatooine system. The freighter refuses to make the jump to Dantooine unless someone can escort it through the system. You need to escort the target through the system.
entries.title: Tatooine System: Escort the Lemdurion Plate Freighter
entries.thanks_4: Not sure which is worse...the pirates or having to go to Dantooine.
entries.thanks_3: I still don't want to go to Dantooine.
entries.thanks_2: I guess it could be worse.
entries.taunt_5: Avast matey...hand over the cargo and we might only blow your ship up.
entries.taunt_4: You should really just run now!
entries.taunt_3: I think that cargo will fetch a hefty price.
entries.taunt_2: Ah, a ship ripe with booty!
entries.shields_depleted: Well, there went my shields. I hope your boss is going to pay for any damage I take.
entries.reason_5: Ok, fine. If you watch my back as I head to the jump point, I will make the delivery to Dantooine.
entries.reason_4: Ok, fine. If you watch my back as I head to the jump point, I will make the delivery to Dantooine.
entries.reason_3: Ok, fine. If you watch my back as I head to the jump point, I will make the delivery to Dantooine.
entries.reason_2: Ok, fine. If you watch my back as I head to the jump point, I will make the delivery to Dantooine.
entries.reason_1: Ok, fine. If you watch my back as I head to the jump point, I will make the delivery to Dantooine.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: A navigation location will be supplied to you once you enter the Tatooine system. Meet the freighter at the arrival point.
entries.quest_location_d: The Freighter is currently waiting in the Tatooine system for an escort.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escor the freighter through the system and protect it.
entries.panic_5: What is the deal with all of these pirates?
entries.panic_4: Going to Dantooine is bad luck...look at all those pirates!
entries.panic_3: This is the last time I ever agree to go to Dantooine.
entries.panic_2: No amount of money is worth this.
entries.panic_1: Pirates! Keep them away from me.
entries.hull_half: My hull is about to crack! This is the worst job I have ever taken.
entries.goodbye_5: See ya, later. Can't say I like this but I guess I was paid.
entries.goodbye_4: See ya, later. Can't say I like this but I guess I was paid.
entries.goodbye_3: See ya, later. Can't say I like this but I guess I was paid.
entries.goodbye_2: See ya, later. Can't say I like this but I guess I was paid.
entries.goodbye_1: See ya, later. Can't say I like this but I guess I was paid.
entries.found_loc: Alright. He said he would meet us here. Get there and make sure he gets to Dantooine in one piece.
entries.failed_protect: Travel from assigned nav point to nav point looking for anything unusual.
entries.failed_destroy: We needed that plating...what the ship? Who cares...I needed that plating!
entries.complete: Ok, we have the freighter on our scans. Good work.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Ok, wait here for the freighter with that plating to arrive. Once he shows up, escort the freighter to the Dantooine jump point.
entries.abort: What are you doing? I thought the station actually wanted this stuff.
